analysis.description: EOSC.isContract (/unique_chucks/8/0x91bbbef2236595718b958b5c983187482f66000f.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0x91bbbef2236595718b958b5c983187482f66000f.sol:
	Contract EOSC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x91bbbef2236595718b958b5c983187482f66000f.sol#139-142)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

EOSC.claimToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x91bbbef2236595718b958b5c983187482f66000f.sol#216-222) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/8/0x91bbbef2236595718b958b5c983187482f66000f.sol#219-222)
